name: Dragos drake
description: the aim of this game is to challenge your self to reach a score of 100. use the space bar to shoot fire balls and leftclick to jump. Trust me your in for some fun.  Also if your friend makes fun of you challenge him to get to a score of 100. By the way drake means dragon in sweden. Also can u guys also tell me after playing this game how to integrate a shiba inu into a similar game😂😂😂
